name: Karsa Flash Payer
overview:
The Karsa Video Player allows video publishers to charge for their content without placing it behind a pay wall (As people don’t generally pay for something they have not seen).

Instead of forcing the viewer to register and/or pay before viewing (any video content) it allows viewers to watch the video for a set time and when their hooked, the screen stops and prompts payment via a very, very simple system (PayPal) 3 clicks later and the video continues. Everyone’s happy.

Payments go directly into the publishers own PayPal account.

The admin system also supports overlay adverts, stats and gives full control over all variables such as separate time limits per video and publishers can set different costs / durations for each video.
